location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'Memo. of Instructions for the Guard over the Four Prisoners in the Buildings of the Residency Office'

mods.abstract: Memorandum providing instructions for the guarding and care of four prisoners being detained in the Treasury Building of the Residency. The instructions include their supervision; provision of meals and clothes; and details regarding who they are and aren't permitted to communicate with.A copy of the memorandum can also be found at folios 20-21.
